## Loading the data

This project is so interesting and relevant to my life! Heyyyyy Naomi!! what is up??

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r}
candidates %>%
  select(cand_id, cand_name, cand_party_affiliation, cand_office_state, cand_election_yr) %>%
  filter(cand_election_yr=="2012")
```

```{r}
contributions %>%
  select(cand_id,name,transaction_amt)
```

```{r}
cand_contribution_join <- candidates %>%
  full_join(contributions, by="cand_id")

cand_contribution_join
```
